meta.title: CSSSR – Outsource Front End Development
meta.description: We’re an international group of IT companies that helps our clients build reliable web solutions.

hero.title: CSSSR — Outsource Web Development
hero.description: CSSSR is a web-development group of companies. Though front-end development services are our specialty, we provide superb back-end and devops services, along with design to help our clients build top to bottom solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Though web development services are our specialty, we also do superb design to help our clients build top to bottom solutions.

outsourcing.title: Web Development Outsourcing
outsourcing.description: Fast, reliable and professional web development services.

backend.title: Back-End & DevOps
backend.description: Reinforce your web application with reliable back-end development and duly adjusted infrastructure.

mvp.title: MVP Development
mvp.description: A Minimum Viable Product is the most basic functioning version of a product, which is meant to guide its future development.

design.title: DesignLab
design.description: We have Humble Team who focuses on design that would fulfill the most complex expectations of users and investors, and help to accomplish your revenue goals.

feature1.text: We believe attention to detail and well established business processes differentiate successful projects and those that are just average.

feature2.text: There is no perfect framework or library. Depending on the type of task, we choose the most appropriate tools. We keep a careful eye on emerging web development trends and never compromise best practice.

industries.title: Industries
industries.subtitle: We take a goal-oriented approach across a wide range of industries

fintech.title: Fintech
fintech.description: We’ve built a strong digital presence for many banking and financial services.

eCommerce.title: E-Commerce
eCommerce.description: We help our clients in the highly competitive e-commerce industry win each new customer.

information.title: Information Technology
information.description: We push IT-companies to the cutting edge of technological progress.

mediaAndMarketing.title: Media & Marketing
mediaAndMarketing.description: We deliver high-quality experiences capable of handling large-scale data and any scale of concurrent users.

aboutUs.title:
We Really Love
What We
aboutUs.description: Headquartered in Singapore, CSSSR is a group of companies that brings together top talent based around the globe to produce the highest quality results.

tracker.title: CSSSR.Tracker
tracker.description: We’ve created an app that helps us manage time on our projects. Give it a try.

lms.title: Modular Learning Management System
lms.description: Our LMS helps to start E-Learning business. We offer design and development teams to do all the necessary integrations and personalization. The system is designed to support pedagogical models and help you to streamline your training.

blog.title: CSSSR.Blog
blog.description: Our thoughts about web development, business processes and remote culture.

post1.title: How Close Your Outsourced Team Should Be Located? Pros and Cons

post2.title: Augmented & Virtual Reality to Shape the Future of Web Development

post3.title: HTML, CMS or Custom Development: Which is Better?
